title: Weekly Wheat Outlook
content: Romanian wheat export demand remains firm with top buyers from North Africa securing October shipments at premiums amid tight Black Sea logistics.

title: Corn Market Snapshot
content: Stronger barge flows on the Danube lifted corn differentials while harvest pressure keeps basis offers competitive for November loadings.

title: Soybean Complex Update
content: Soybean meal bookings into the Middle East rose 8% week on week as crushers chase higher crush margins and tight oil supplies.

title: Sunflower Focus
content: Sunflower oil spreads narrowed as EU crushers locked in nearby demand; look for basis support if Black Sea weather disrupts loadings.
